bug.summary: Documentation bug report: Some of the descriptions in the tables are truncated.
bug.description:
Some of the descriptions in the tables are truncated, e.g. , in <denchmark-link:https://docs.chainer.org/en/latest/reference/functions.html>Standard Function implementations page</denchmark-link> . I made the following observations.
The docstring for each of them is not truncated and written correctly, e.g. chainer.functions.batch_l2_norm_squared . The detail page for each of them is rendered correctly, e.g. chainer.functions.batch_l2_norm_squared. (The docstring for each of them has the word a.k.a.)

comments.comment: Thank you for reporting! I made a fix: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainer/pull/3235>#3235</denchmark-link> .
